about.description: CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (STEM) experiments
about.summary: CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (STEM) experiments

name: prismatic_cli
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: prismatic_cli
    version: 1.2.1
source:
    patches:
        - 0001-Fix-GUI_SOURCE_FILE-in-CMakeLists.txt.patch
        - 0001-fftw_cmake.patch
        - 0001-fix_pyprismatic_macos.patch
    sha256: 844f659575dd98999b7c4864e850a7ec735f297ab1fb6c2d2be91d7f9720fe70
    url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic/archive/1.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 9
    script: bash ${RECIPE_DIR}/combined_build_install.sh cli
    string: cpu_hbd1d0a5_9
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_3
        - c-ares 1.16.1 haf1e3a3_3
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cctools 949.0.1 h22b1bf0_7
        - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h5ba7a2e_7
        - clang 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clang_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_9
        - clangxx 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clangxx_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_9
        - cmake 3.18.2 h9f6fb0d_0
        - compiler-rt 10.0.1 he6db49b_0
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 10.0.1 h033240e_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h75d18d8_3
        - ld64 530 7
        - ld64_osx-64 530 h3c32e8a_7
        - libclang-cpp10 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - libcurl 7.71.1 h9bf37e3_5
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
        - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
        - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 h009f743_3
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h7580e61_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h8a08a2b_5
        - libuv 1.39.0 haf1e3a3_0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 h1341992_3
        - make 4.3 h0b31af3_0
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g haf1e3a3_1
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 hdc84dc8_1006
        - rhash 1.3.6 h1de35cc_1001
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h879752b_4
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_0
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    host:
        - boost-cpp 1.72.0 he5d75e3_3
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_3
        - fftw 3.3.8 nompi_h44ae4c8_1111
        - hdf5 1.10.6 nompi_haae91d6_101
        - icu 67.1 hb1e8313_0
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libgfortran 4.0.0 3
        - libgfortran4 7.5.0 h1565451_3
        - llvm-openmp 10.0.1 h28b9765_0
        - lz4-c 1.9.2 hb1e8313_3
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
        - zstd 1.4.5 h289c70a_2
    ignore_run_exports:
        - boost-cpp
    run:
        - fftw >=3.3.8,<4.0a0
        - hdf5 >=1.10.6,<1.10.7.0a0
        - libcxx >=10.0.1
test:
    commands:
        - prismatic -i SI100.XYZ
        - prismatic-double -i SI100.XYZ
    source_files:
        - SI100.XYZ
about:
    description: 'CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission
        Electron Microscopy (STEM) experiments

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic
    home: http://prism-em.com/
    license: GPL-3.0-only
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission Electron
        Microscopy (STEM) experiments
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - douglowe
        - ericpre
        - tschoonj
